messages.message:
Has anyone seen issues in the past with viewing Instabase files on localhost. Here is the things we are seeing:
• Repos and drives are displayed in the UI
• Trying to read or open any file in the UI or via api results in “Access denied”
• Account service shows “Access denied” in the CLI when doing this
• This is after recompiling, from master, account-tservice, repo-tservice, mount-tservice, and file-tservice

I usually use prebuilt docker images for all the core services and when I run into issues with a particular service, I build and run locally until I wait out the issue with the prebuilt image. Have seen some of those things intermittently in the past but not on latest master
I see, so we can run these locally? @Ahsaas what you might want to try to do is navigate to `core-services/file-tservice` and run `make clean build runlocal`
